reviews.review: it has such a great story line and the best characters.
great game fun with friends and on your own

Portal 2 is an absolutely phenomenal game with several aspects that no other game has. I finished the entire campaign and now spend my time in the puzzle editor. It's amazing that this game is still one of the most popular titles after 9 years on the catalog. The workshop community is very large and you can find a lot of projects made by people everywhere. If you have a creative mind, this game is for you. If you just want to play, you can easily press Quick Play in the PETI screen. Overall, I think this game is excellent.
a cheap game that everybody can buy and play , totally worth
Best first person puzzle-based cooperative game around...
de los mejores juegos de valve lo adoro es uno de mis juegoss favoritos

Portal 2 is one of the greatest single-player video games I have ever played. From the story, to the thrilling gameplay, to the antagonistic side-characters, to the everything, makes this one of my personal favorites.

Portal 2 has been a giant leap since Portal 1, with a ton of more content added than in the first, and more plot twists than ever before. I've never felt so betrayed in a video game in a very, very long time, and I've played a lot of video games in my life. Valve working on this masterpiece of a game, was an outstanding move and I couldn't of asked for a better video game developing company to do so.

I'm amazed that a project this successful, started out as a dream from a couple of college tech students who caught Valve's attention, and immediately went into development. Portal started not even named Portal, and yet, it was unsurprisingly turned into the best storytelling, thrilling puzzle-solving game of all time.
My favorite puzzle game of all time
damn good , best puzzle game ever

This is easily one of my favorite games as of right now, the map designs the voice acting and you can tell the devs really cared about making this a phenomenal game and solving a puzzle or even just a part of one after being stuck for 20 minutes is really satisfying, overall what I like is that the story is told through old recordings and the whole your alone in an abandoned laboratory with and AI stuck on your portal gun, I really recommend this game to anyone who likes puzzle games or people who just like games in general.

What i love the most about Portal 2 is not only the great iconic story but the possibility it gives for the player to work their creativity by creating their very own chambers!! This is why this game will always have a space in my heart and why i would like YOU to try it!!

Fun, fun, fun. Many hours of fun puzzles to solve and think about and an amazing story with an epic conclusion. 9/10 would recommend.

If Portal was a great game, then this. This is the pinnacle of gaming. This game is a masterpiece. I finally beat it after 13 hours and wow it was worth it! The gameplay is so fun and it's not mindless like other similar games. It's also creative and fun and a great experience. It's new gimmicks and quirks are amazing. 8 years later, I couldn't recommend this game more. This game goes on sale often for $1 (as it currently is as of writing this) which is such a steal. Please buy this game. I love you Valve. Maybe one day, we'll get a true Portal 3. We can only dream.

This is a very original and unique game. Really cool mechanics with those gels. You need to use your brain and you're on cloud nine. There are no long cutscenes, all characters are interesting and funny (GlaDOS and Wheatley). Boss fight is not hard and the game is not too long or too short. It's perfect! 10/10

It is a good game... If I would've purchased it when it was new for the full $60 price, I would've been upset with how short the campaign is. But, for roughly $20-$30 it is excellent. Some things about the narrative were kind of upsetting, but it was still good. They tried too hard to push the humor, whereas in the original the humor was so subtle it made it great.
